response.overview: Rita, an underrated lawyer working for a large law firm more interested in getting criminals out of jail than bringing them to justice, is hired by the leader of a criminal organization.
response.title: Emilia Pérez

crew.name: Nancy Valle
crew.job: Executive In Charge Of Post Production
